code: import React,{useState}from'react';import CategorySection from'./CategorySection';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BeltSection=_ref=>{let{belt,categories,onUpdate}=_ref;const[isExpanded,setIsExpanded]=useState(false);const toggleExpanded=()=>{setIsExpanded(!isExpanded);};const handleCategoryUpdate=(category,newData)=>{onUpdate(belt,category,newData);};const getTotalItems=()=>{return Object.values(categories).reduce((total,items)=>{return total+(Array.isArray(items)?items.length:0);},0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"belt-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"belt-header",onClick:toggleExpanded,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{margin:0},children:belt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"belt-count",children:[Object.keys(categories).length," categories, ",getTotalItems()," total items"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`expand-icon ${isExpanded?'expanded':''}`,children:"\u25B6"})]}),isExpanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"belt-content",children:Object.entries(categories).map(_ref2=>{let[category,items]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategorySection,{belt:belt,category:category,items:items,onUpdate:handleCategoryUpdate},category);})})]});};export default BeltSection;
